title: Has anyone else lost motivation to try their best in a game?
body:
I am wasting my time now when playing pretty much, I get nothing out of it because I am not motivated to put anything in

Does this happen to other people?

replies.body: not really. I mean sometimes i do but like my team decides that for the start they will feed then somehow they get 2 aces and win. My team is weird??? Anyway never give up {{champion:150}} (pikachu)
yes i got sick of constantly playing in uncarryable games. i lost motivation as it became irrelevant how good (or bad) i played so what i did was stop playing. that's what you should do.
lol wen I do good in a game 90% of the time my team feeds and wen im bad in game 90% of the time I loss lol wat is dis

Motivation for any activity comes from the enjoyment you will get out of participating in it. If you lose the motivation to play your best in League as with any activity it's usually due to the fact that the excitement has gone out of it which could be due to a number of reasons such as poor results. What I would suggest is try spicing things up with your game play for a while instead of taking the game seriously like you're in LCS. Maybe try some different champions in weird roles e.g. anivia jungle. Once you've got the enjoyment out of playing the game again should you start trying to play seriously again.

Not all games, I definitely start with a good attitude, but if I get trolls, bad players, AFK and the usual mob of 12 year olds who ruin your game, the motivation stops.

I have gone from scores like 6/0 in the first 15 minutes to 6/12 because I decided to look at the map and scoreboard... and actually see what mess the rest of my team was in.

I can get de-motivated very quickly if my team starts shit, I couldn't actually care less if my team was bad, but if they have a bad attitude, even if they are great and we are winning, I will give up and would rather see the ass hats lose.
